They've ____ a ____ of ____ from ____ friends ____ family ____ the ____. But they plan to keep eating this way, at least until they get bored of it.

They've got___ a l__ of ques_____ from th___ friends a__ family ab___ the deci____. But they plan to keep eating this way, at least until they get bored of it.
data.answer: 特蕾莎和迈克暂时尝试素食。特蕾莎想要更健康，迈克只是想少花些钱在肉上。他们从朋友和家人那里得到了很多关于这个决定的问题。但它们打算继续这样吃下去，至少直到它们厌倦为止。
